mdRecord.dcterms:description: This article, "Lo, How a Rose . . . " by Richard R. Fletcher, Executive Secretary appeared in the periodical, "The Delta, Sigma Nu Fraternity," with the date of September 1958. The article is about the history of Sigma Nu's official flower -- a white rose which came from Blandome. The cover of that issue of The Delta features a picture of a different rose.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lo, How a Rose, September 1958
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Roses
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
Sigma Nu
